product_name: Darn Tough Wide Stripe Mid-Calf Socks
long_description: Upgrade your sock collection with the Wide Stripe Mid-Calf Socks from Darn Tough. Soft merino wool, seamless construction and statement-making stripes take these casual socks way beyond basic. Merino wool/nylon/spandex fabric blend is soft and breathable while providing light cushioning and the perfect amount of stretch. Merino wool supplies light insulation and continues to insulate even when damp; merino wool is also naturally odor-resistant. Darn Tough Wide Stripe Mid-Calf Socks feature seamless construction to reduce blisters and chafing.
short_description: Upgrade your sock collection with the Wide Stripe Mid-Calf Socks from Darn Tough. Soft merino wool, seamless construction and statement-making stripes take these casual socks way beyond basic.
